channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #pt @ 1463684788024393732
item.description: Essa quarta não vai rolar nowcasting de hospitalizações e óbitos por SRAG e COVID-19. Por algum motivo, não sei qual, os dados abertos do SIVEP não foram publicados hoje às 19hs como tem sido feito toda quarta feira. Aproximadamente as 21hs o site saiu do opendatasus saiu do ar. https://t.co/NCMkZQlJDN

item.title: #de @ 1463659730296057856
item.description: Ich freue mich, dass ihr euch über die Passus zu F/LOSS und Open Data im Koa-Vertrag freut. Behaltet aber im Kopf, dass Staatlichkeit in der Vergangenheit immer wieder ganz andere Interpretationen von Begriffen gezeigt hat, von denen wir alle glaubten, dass sie klar seien.

item.title: #en @ 1463658107511451653
item.description: Here’s a list of some sites that have open data sets. If you’re working on data projects these should help. 🧵🧑🏾‍💻

item.title: #en @ 1463643914024505355
item.description: Memorable #dtv21 diner, where I got humbly squeezed between two of my open data heroes. On the left @pietercolpaert (@OpenKnowledgeBE / Linked Data /…) and on the right @timberners_lee (@solidmit / ODI / inventor of WWW <- to which I owe my entire career)! https://t.co/Dyek7YspLC

item.title: #es @ 1463641333038473220
item.description: Cuantos medios venezolanos tienen un Analista de Datos o Consultor en Análisis de Datos como parte de su staff regular y que les produzca contenido de calidad sobre eventos electorales, encuestas, o datos abiertos, y en general.

Every 💲 can make the difference between life & death for those facing #hunger.
WFP uses #blockchain to close the gap, providing families better assistance while becoming more financially transparent than ever.
WFP is open, data-driven & accountable.: https://t.co/9maljL6iH1 https://t.co/B13Oc3yv5P

item.description: "Wir führen einen Rechtsanspruch auf Open Data ein und verbessern die Datenexpertise öffentlicher Stellen." https://t.co/CxllRtU2Fj

item.title: #de @ 1463524934081257482
item.description:
"Wir führen einen Rechtsanspruch auf Open Data ein und verbessern die Datenexpertise öffentlicher Stellen."
Allein dafür, das es so explizit im Koalitionsvertrag steht, gibt es einen kleinen Applaus von mir. Ja, die Umsetzung ist ein ganz anderes Thema, aber es wurde mitgedacht.

Our #OpenData is an enabler for international partnerships https://t.co/lm5DfsP4E1

item.title: #en @ 1463415061469446149
item.description: The ditch map is finally released as open data. It contains 82 % of all ditches in Sweden and the lenght of the mapped channels is enough to circle the earth 24 times! Most of these channels were made by hand. https://t.co/XpUbc0T8K2

item.title: #en @ 1463221286847537152
item.description: 3,000+ #SocialProtection measures are helping ppl cope with lockdowns & job loss. But men & #women don’t have equal access to these schemes. We need more sex-disaggregated data to understand impacts on men & women, to address uneven economic recovery. https://t.co/TOtLCPRU0w https://t.co/yFleeyHkjN

item.title: #en @ 1463218123948150784
item.description: Many cities are moving to an "open data" model that allows companies to draw upon public resources to build products like predictive policing software. That's how Philly got its open data policy, the head Azavea, creator of Hunchlab, lobbied for it. https://t.co/NKuPcvowgx https://t.co/HOtcQjpLmB

item.title: #it @ 1463212981597134851
item.description: @ondatait @ItaliaDomaniGov si parla solo di formato... a me queste cose preoccupano sempre. Che poi il formato navigabile che è? Ma non si poteva far riferimento alla definizione #opendata dentro il CAD - Codice dell'Amministrazione Digitale? Non era più pulito?

item.description: Join us on 12/3 at 9am PST as we hear from Dr. Josef Kellndorfer @EarthBigData on his work using global coherence and backscatter Sentinel-1 time series data. @SFBayAreaGRSS #RemoteSensing #Sentinel1 #OpenData Registration link: https://t.co/XZDwrQZLrb https://t.co/3d998wNrw9

item.title: #fr @ 1463199915635527684
item.description: Le savez-vous ? La #Drees met ligne une maquette de "cas-types", qui permet de visualiser le revenu mensuel (après prestations familiales et de solidarité perçues et impôts versés) d’un ménage, en fonction de ses ressources avant redistribution. #opendata https://t.co/3tMQfZejhs

item.title: #en @ 1463199080839065614
item.description:
#EUOpenDataDays Pascal Leardini remarks: "Spending Programmes in #EU should generate positive results on ground and for this we rely on quality #OpenData 📌curated & reusable 📌properly documented & stored that come from MS, able to support policy choices"

item.title: #it @ 1463176988651405313
item.description: L'importanza di avere open data: @istsupsan pubblica dati del genere MA solo in pdf al contrario di altri Paesi, quindi @OurWorldInData (e chiunque voglia) non può usarli facilmente. https://t.co/zbnAxAj4gM
